alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:03PM CDT until May 07 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JONES AND SOUTHEASTERN FISHER COUNTIES... At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sylvester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Neinda and Noodle around 520 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126 and Stith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
